author: TaiSakuma
body:
As the PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/3801 was closed with unmerged commits, this PR requests similar commits for 72X

This PR is mergeable at the moment.  However, since this PR involves changes in many packages, it will be probably soon unmergeable. I would like to request to merge this PR soon while it is still mergeable.
title: change the naming convention of CaloMETs
